        public void sendPlayerToRandomLobby(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Attempts to send a player to a UHC lobby. Precondition: Plugin has attempted to connect to redis. If a lobby is not found, player is simply kicked.
        Parameters:
        Player - p

      • setActiveState

        public void setActiveState(GameState state,
                           boolean callExit)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the active state, enters it, and "exits" the old one if a state was active previously.
        Parameters:
        {@link - GameState} state - The state to become active.
        callExit - - If the GameState.#onExit() should be called or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - GameState must be inside of the "states" ArrayList.
